title: The pigeons that helped Israel win a war
text:
The pigeons that helped Israel win a war 9:25pm IST - 01:18 
As Israel gears up for its 70th anniversary, a kibbutz with a historic dovecote is dedicated to telling a little-known part of the story. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
